about.content: As a Frontend Developer, I specialize in crafting compelling and user-friendly interfaces for websites and web applications, demonstrating proficiency in translating design concepts into responsive layouts using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborating effectively with designers and backend developers, I ensure seamless integration of frontend elements. My expertise extends to guaranteeing cross-browser compatibility, optimal performance, and mobile responsiveness. I am committed to maintaining high standards in code quality through thorough testing and debugging, utilizing version control systems like Git.

education.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
Diploma in Computer Science and Engineering
